Selected Answer: D
For the administrator comfortable with point-and-click changes and not managing code or technical items, the best option to ensure the changes make it accurately to production is:

D. Create a change set, upload it to production, and deploy the change set.

Change sets are a Salesforce tool designed specifically for migrating configuration changes from one organization to another, such as from a sandbox to a production environment. They allow administrators to select and bundle the specific changes they want to deploy, including Experience Cloud site configurations, and then deploy them to production in a controlled manner. This method aligns with the administrator's comfort level with point-and-click changes and provides a straightforward way to migrate changes accurately to production.

D is the correct option.
The key here is "The administrator is comfortable with point and click changes but is not comfortable with managing code or more technical items."

What are the two ways the consultant should associate the articles with topics? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AB
The correct options are:

A. Manually add one or more topics to each article within Workspaces.
- Within Workspaces, consultants can manually associate articles with topics by selecting relevant topics for each article. This allows for precise categorization and organization of the knowledge base content.

B. Establish automatic topic assignment of topics to specified data categories within workspaces.
- Consultants can set up automatic topic assignment based on specified data categories within Workspaces. This ensures that articles are associated with relevant topics based on predefined criteria, streamlining the topic assignment process and maintaining consistency in topic categorization.

questions.question_text:
Ursa Major Solar is utilizing audience targeting for specific components in its portal.

Which two considerations regarding audience targeting are true? (Choose two.)

choices.A: Available domains are created in the Administration workspace and associated with a community through a custom URL.
choices.D: Record-based criteria are unable to be assigned to a component or branding set.
choices.C: Audiences are unable to be assigned to the components in the template header and footer sections.
choices.B: You can only have three audiences.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: CD
The two considerations regarding audience targeting that are true are:

C. Audiences are unable to be assigned to the components in the template header and footer sections. - This is accurate because, audience targeting is not available for components in the header and footer sections of templates.

D. Record-based criteria are unable to be assigned to a component or branding set. - This is also true. Record-based criteria are used for visibility based on data related to specific records, such as criteria based on fields in a record. As of until now, record-based criteria cannot be directly assigned to a component or branding set; instead, they are applied at the page level.
